Docs.summary: Provides a high level abstraction object model that builds around Microsoft Active Directory services tasks. The Active Directory service concepts such as forest, domain, site, subnet, partition, and schema are part of the object model.

remarks.format: ## Remarks The <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory> namespace is used to automate Active Directory management tasks. <xref:System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory> is not used to access data that resides within Active Directory or any other directory service. The <xref:System.DirectoryServices> namespace should be used for this purpose.
